Legacy Wall

Building Fund Program

The purpose of the Building Fund Program is to raise money for the purchase and maintenance of the CFL Motorcycle Ministry Clubhouse. Proceeds are dedicated specifically to the Clubhouse Building Fund to honor all who have contributed.

Dedicated Supporters

$5,000 Donation Level

Includes an Individual Custom Wooden Plaque with personalized engraved metal plaques.

VIP
$1,000 Donation
Gold
$500 Donation
Silver
$300 Donation
Bronze
$100 Donation

Leave Your Legacy

Be a permanent part of our story. By contributing to the Clubhouse Building Fund, your name or organization will be honored on the Christ For Life Legacy Wall. Contact our President today to secure your place.
